code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{io}from"socket.io-client";import useCharacterStore from"../stores/characterStore";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const socket=io("http://localhost:3001");export const SocketManager=()=>{const setCharacters=useCharacterStore(state=>state.setCharacters);useEffect(()=>{function onConnect(){console.log("connected");}function onDisconnect(){console.log("disconnected");}function onCharacters(characters){setCharacters(characters);console.log(characters);}socket.on("connect",onConnect);socket.on("disconnect",onDisconnect);socket.on("characters",onCharacters);return()=>{socket.off("connect",onConnect);socket.off("disconnect",onDisconnect);socket.off("characters",onCharacters);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{});};
